snippet: Wider coverage strengthens the case for retaining President Obama’s health care reform law.
abstract: Editorial notes that the number of uninsured Americans has declined for the first time since 2007, a direct result of the health care reform law and better coverage under public programs like Medicaid; holds that repealing the Affordable Care Act, as Republicans would like to do, would be a disastrous move.
lead_paragraph: Wider coverage strengthens the case for retaining President Obama’s health care reform law.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
